info.readme:
The Dependences must be installed before installing this for the pack to install correctly.
List of dependencies: - Link Picker - Char Limit - Nested Content - EZSearch
This pack installs the following: - Data types - Templates - Doc Types
The Partial Views must be created / copied across manually.

GenericProperty.Name: Content
GenericProperty.Description: Each entry will be a new accordion tab

Info.Name: Blog
Info.Description: Page holding all the blog posts

GenericProperty.Name: URL slug
GenericProperty.Description: Optionally change the URL of the page

GenericProperty.Name: Don't follow
GenericProperty.Description: When checked the page has a "noindex, nofollow" meta tag

GenericProperty.Name: Invisible redirect
GenericProperty.Description: Redirect to the selected page with NO URL redirection

GenericProperty.Name: URL alias
GenericProperty.Description: Optionally create multiple URLs for the same page. Use wisely, too many can damage SEO ranking

GenericProperty.Name: Hide from search
GenericProperty.Description: Checking this will hide the age from the site search results

GenericProperty.Name: Hide from navigation
GenericProperty.Description: Checking this will hide the page from the navigation

GenericProperty.Name: Headline
GenericProperty.Description: If left blank, the page name will be used

GenericProperty.Name: Excerpt
GenericProperty.Description: A short description of the article

GenericProperty.Name: Headline
GenericProperty.Description: If left blank, the page name will be used

GenericProperty.Name: Subtitle
GenericProperty.Description: Subtitle displayed below the page name

GenericProperty.Name: Headline
GenericProperty.Description: If left blank, the page name will be used

GenericProperty.Name: Introduction
GenericProperty.Description: Short introduction to the page and subpages

GenericProperty.Name: Featured image
GenericProperty.Description: The main image of the page (e.g when page is listed on the website)

GenericProperty.Name: Page description
GenericProperty.Description: Description of the page (only used on the website)

GenericProperty.Name: Tags
GenericProperty.Description: Add tag properties here

GenericProperty.Name: Page content
GenericProperty.Description: Main content of the page

GenericProperty.Name: Textarea
GenericProperty.Description: This is where the main text for this section would be input. You have access to titles by pressing Format. (Optional)

GenericProperty.Name: Release date
GenericProperty.Description: Date and time (used for sorting)

GenericProperty.Name: Social media image
GenericProperty.Description: Image used when sharing on social media

GenericProperty.Name: SEO title
GenericProperty.Description: When left empty the 'page name + website name' will be used

GenericProperty.Name: SEO description
GenericProperty.Description: Description shown when sharing the page on social platforms and search engine results

GenericProperty.Name: Title
GenericProperty.Description: Title of the contact details block

GenericProperty.Name: Contact details
GenericProperty.Description: All contact details for this section (phone, email, fax)

GenericProperty.Name: Files
GenericProperty.Description: Files to be listed in the downloads area

GenericProperty.Name: Title
GenericProperty.Description: Title of the downloads area

GenericProperty.Name: Alignment
GenericProperty.Description: The embedded content will be aligned to this selection (full width if blank)

GenericProperty.Name: Embed code
GenericProperty.Description: Embed code from source (YouTube, Google Maps)

Info.Name: ezSearch
Info.Description: ezSearch page. (adjust settings via the macro in the ezSearch template)

GenericProperty.Name: Form
GenericProperty.Description: Form to display

GenericProperty.Name: Title
GenericProperty.Description: Title of the form (optional)

Info.Name: Form folder
Info.Description: Folder to store all form submissions

GenericProperty.Name: Submit message
GenericProperty.Description: If no 'submit page' is selected (above), this message will be shown when the form is submitted

GenericProperty.Name: Submit page
GenericProperty.Description: If a page is selected, the user will be redirected to it when submitting the form

GenericProperty.Name: Internal notifications
GenericProperty.Description: Email address for internal notifications

GenericProperty.Name: Internal notifications CC
GenericProperty.Description: CC addresses for internal notifications (comma separated)

GenericProperty.Name: Notification message
GenericProperty.Description: Confirmation email body send to the person submitting the form.

GenericProperty.Name: Send notification
GenericProperty.Description: Send notification email to the person who submitted the form

GenericProperty.Name: Notification title
GenericProperty.Description: Title of the confirmation email notification

GenericProperty.Name: From address
GenericProperty.Description: FROM email address (default is noreply@)

GenericProperty.Name: Sender name
GenericProperty.Description: Name of the sender

GenericProperty.Name: Aspect ratio
GenericProperty.Description: Picking an aspect ratio will use the crop from the media section

GenericProperty.Name: Alignment
GenericProperty.Description: The gallery will be aligned to this selection (full width if blank)

GenericProperty.Name: Gallery
GenericProperty.Description: Images for the gallery

GenericProperty.Name: Website name
GenericProperty.Description: This is used in titles on search engines and social media

GenericProperty.Name: Default social media image
GenericProperty.Description: Default image used when sharing a page on social media

GenericProperty.Name: Tracking Id
GenericProperty.Description: Google Analytics ID (UA-000000-01)

GenericProperty.Name: Default featured image
GenericProperty.Description: Default image used in gateway pages and listings

GenericProperty.Name: Footer navigation
GenericProperty.Description: Selected pages are displayed at the bottom of the page

GenericProperty.Name: Copyright disclaimer
GenericProperty.Description: Legal information that appears at the bottom of the page (Press Shift + ENTER for new line)

GenericProperty.Name: Introduction text
GenericProperty.Description: Introduction text for the accreditation section above the footer

GenericProperty.Name: Accreditations
GenericProperty.Description: Accreditation logos shown in the section

GenericProperty.Name: Aspect ratio
GenericProperty.Description: Picking an aspect ratio will use the crop from the media section

GenericProperty.Name: Image
GenericProperty.Description: Pick an image from the media library

GenericProperty.Name: Alignment
GenericProperty.Description: The image will be aligned to this selection (full width if blank)

Info.Name: In the media
Info.Description: In the media - link to external source

GenericProperty.Name: Source
GenericProperty.Description: Link to the source

GenericProperty.Name: Value
GenericProperty.Description: Value shown

GenericProperty.Name: Label
GenericProperty.Description: Label of the value

GenericProperty.Name: Logo
GenericProperty.Description: Logo

GenericProperty.Name: Link name
GenericProperty.Description: Link name

GenericProperty.Name: Link url
GenericProperty.Description: Link URL to a source

GenericProperty.Name: No results message
GenericProperty.Description: Message shown when there are no results found

GenericProperty.Name: Author
GenericProperty.Description: Author of the post

GenericProperty.Name: Category
GenericProperty.Description: Category of the post

Info.Name: Sitemap
Info.Description: A list of pages of a web site accessible to users

GenericProperty.Name: Social platform
GenericProperty.Description: Social platform name

GenericProperty.Name: Link
GenericProperty.Description: Full link to the chosen social platform account (with http://)

GenericProperty.Name: Content
GenericProperty.Description: Each entry will be a new tab

GenericProperty.Name: No results message
GenericProperty.Description: Message shown when no results are found

GenericProperty.Name: Content
GenericProperty.Description: Text content for the page

GenericProperty.Name: Label
GenericProperty.Description: Internal use label for this area (not visible on the website)

GenericProperty.Name: Title
GenericProperty.Description: Title of this section

GenericProperty.Name: Content
GenericProperty.Description: Text content for this section

Template.Name: Article
Blog
Home
Master
News
Post
Search
Sitemap
Text page

property.name: Field that flags whether page should be hidden from results
Type of content to search for (CONTENT, MEDIA, BOTH)
Number of results to show per page
Fields to show as the result preview
Maximum length of the preview text
Root content node to search from
Root media node to search from
Location of the search form (TOP, BOTTOM, BOTH, NONE)

DictionaryItem.Value: No results found for search term {0}.

DataType.Name: Media Picker - Multiple items, images only, folders enabled
RTE - 350px, code, remove format, style, triple emphasis, list, anchor, image, table, no label
RTE - 200px, code, remove format, style, triple emphasis, list, anchor
Dropdown list - Alignment with full width
Media Picker - Single item, images only, disable folder
RTE - 75px, remove format, triple emphasis, anchor
